title: Flight Simulator 2020 - POI's - France - Perret tower
description:
In this video we will fly over the Perret tower. The Perret tower, originally called La tour pour regarder les montagnes ("The tower for looking at the mountains"), is an observation tower located in Grenoble, in the Paul Mistral public park. It is the first tower built in reinforced concrete in Europe. In 1998, it was officially declared to be a national heritage site. It was built for the International Exhibition of Hydropower and Tourism where it was the orientation tower and the symbol of the exhibition. Nowadays, it is the last vestige of this exhibition.
